text: Back from the Dead is a 1957 American horror movie directed by Charles Marquis Warren and based on the 1952 novel The Other One by Catherine Turney. It stars Peggie Castle, Arthur Franz, Marsha Hunt, Don Haggerty, Marianne Stewart and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Charles Marquis Warren
title: Back from the Dead (movie)
